name: Ext_R5_RelatedArtifact_type
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.RelatedArtifact.type for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents RelatedArtifact.type from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/RelatedArtifact|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: documentation | justification | citation | predecessor | successor | derived-from | depends-on | composed-of | part-of | amends | amended-with | appends | appended-with | cites | cited-by | comments-on | comment-in | contains | contained-in | corrects | correction-in | replaces | replaced-with | retracts | retracted-by | signs | similar-to | supports | supported-with | transforms | transformed-into | transformed-with | documents | specification-of | created-with | cite-as
element.definition: The type of relationship to the related artifact.
element.comment: `RelatedArtifact.type` maps to R4B `RelatedArtifact.type`. The value set relationship of SourceIsBroaderThanTarget is INCOMPATIBLE for a required binding on a `code` type in this direction. So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

binding.description: The type of relationship to the related artifact.
